descriptions: ["DescriptionMetropolitan Premium Properties is delighted to bring to the market this exclusive fully furnished 2 bedrooms in Bahwan Tower - a prestigious residential development in the prime location of Burj Khalifa community.- Situated within the Burj Khalifa Community- At the center of a range of shopping, leisure, and recreational outlets- Effortless mobility, with the Dubai Mall and Business Bay Metro station- Close reach and easy access to the major transport routes- Only minutes away from everything Dubai has to offerBuilding Amenities:- Easy access to mall & metro-\xa0Spacious lobby with meeting areas- Closeness to award-winning schools- Great exit and entry point\xa0- Children's play area-\xa024-hour security and access control- CCTV in common areasBahwan Tower Downtown is a 20-storey residential building in\xa0Downtown Dubai, Dubai.\xa0From Bahwan Tower Downtown it takes roughly seven minutes to drive to Dubai Mall, 21 minutes to Palm Jumeirah, 20 minutes to Burj Al Arab and 25 minutes to The Walk JBR."]
